TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create the correct MIP data for all the elements for a AirControlPoint and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates an AirControlPoint with specific information. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly. Nation A updates the AirControlPoint. Nation B receives and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes AirDefence (ControlFeature) message elements, for instance Ground Picture > Air Defence.Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the AirControlPoint is displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates the tactical graphic for an AirControlPoint (air control point) with specific information for the following attributes: * Name * Location * HostilityStatus=Friend * ValidityPeriod * IsActive=No * ReportingDataCategory=Planned
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the AirControlPoint correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the AirControlPoint with new values for the following attributes: * Location * HostilityStatus=Hostile * ValidityPeriod * IsActive=Yes * ReportingDataCategory=Reported
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the updated AirControlPoint correctly.
